thread.title: Italian TV Series To Be Filmed In MaltaTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Italian TV Series To Be Filmed In MaltaTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Italian TV Series To Be Filmed In MaltaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Italian TV Series To Be Filmed In Malta Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
Two episodes of the Italian TV series titled “Task Force 45 – Friendly Fire” produced by RB Productions will be filmed in Malta as of next week.
It will be the second time that renowned Italian actor Raoul Bova will film in Malta after ‘Come un Delfino’.
The two episodes will benefit from financial incentives offered by the Malta Film Commission. Theywill be filmed at various locations including Valletta, Marsa, Delimara, Vittoriosa and at various open coastal locations.
The story will centre around “Task Force 45″ (TF-45) an Italian Special Forces branch of the Italian Army. The International renowned Italian actor Raoul Bova will play as head-of-department for the special interventions Task Force with actress Megan Montaner playing Major De Satnis.
This is the 6th international production to be shot in Malta in 2015, a year which has seen back to back film projects, ensuring consistency for the local film industry.
“Task Force 45” production will be released early next year on Italian channel Canale 5.
Ino Bonello of White Coral Films is servicing the production in Malta.
Source:- Hawaii Tourism Authority
